appendix.def: A supplementary section at the end of a document.
appendix.placeholder: e.g., Appendix A or Appendix B
appendix.name: Appendix

article-locator.def: A unique identifier for an article, often used in digital or online publications.
article-locator.name: Article Locator

book.def: A specific book or volume within a series or collection.
book.placeholder: e.g., Book Title or Book Collection
book.name: Book

canon.def: A standard or rule, often used in legal or religious contexts.
canon.name: Canon

chapter.def: A specific chapter within a book.
chapter.name: Chapter

column.def: A vertical division of text in a document, often in newspapers or magazines.
column.name: Column

elocation.def: An electronic location identifier for digital content.
elocation.name: Elocation

equation.def: A specific equation within a text.
equation.name: Equation

figure.def: A specific figure or illustration in a document.
figure.name: Figure

folio.def: A leaf of a manuscript or book, numbered on the front side only.
folio.name: Folio

issue.def: A specific issue of a journal or magazine.
issue.name: Issue

line.def: A specific line in a poem, play, or other text.
line.name: Line

note.def: A specific footnote or endnote in a text.
note.name: Note

opus.def: A specific work or composition, often used in music.
opus.name: Opus

page.def: A specific page or range of pages in a document.
page.name: Page

paragraph.def: A specific paragraph in a document.
paragraph.name: Paragraph

part.def: A specific part or section of a larger work.
part.name: Part

rule.def: A specific rule or regulation, often used in legal or procedural contexts.
rule.name: Rule

section.def: A specific section of a document.
section.name: Section

sub-verbo.def: An entry under a specific word or heading in a reference work.
sub-verbo.name: Sub-Verbo

supplement.def: A supplementary issue or addition to a publication.
supplement.name: Supplement

table.def: A specific table within a document.
table.name: Table

timestamp.def: A specific time marker, often used in audiovisual materials.
timestamp.name: Timestamp

title.def: A specific title of a work or section within a larger work.
title.name: Title

verse.def: A specific verse in a poem, song, or scripture.
verse.name: Verse

volume.def: A specific volume within a series or set.
volume.name: Volume
